name: MyPrivateSommelier
0:
”Alexa, open My Private Sommelier”
”Alexa, start My Private Sommelier”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my private sommelier
des: Next time you're stuck choosing wine, just ask Alexa for help and inspiration. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
